title: The Night Market by Zachary Rawlins
description:

The only way to retrieve any of what was stolen from her is for Yael to take her brotherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Silver Key, strap on his gas mask, and follow him into the very dreams where he was lost.

Along with Tobi, a brave and resourceful cat, and Jenny Frost, a psychotic, drug-addled homeless girl, Yael will face a blighted wasteland, savage bandits, a Black Train, Elder Horrors, the Outer Dark Ã¢â‚¬â€œ even Nyarlathotep himself Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in a quest to reach a market where dreams are bought and sold.
